name: Credit Scoring and Credit Risk Prediction
description: Credit Scoring and Credit Risk Prediction

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction img-head\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n     \u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\u003d\" alt\u003d\"\"\r\n      alt\u003d\"App Icon\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eCredit Decisioning App\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cp\u003e\r\n      This app helps banks and financial institutions assess customer credit risk using historical credit data and machine learning. It enables informed, data-driven lending decisions by classifying customers into risk categories and visualizing key patterns in loan behavior and savings.\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eInput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cp\u003e\r\n      The app uses customer-level credit and financial data, including:\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Loan Purpose\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Savings Account Balance\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Credit History\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Employment Status\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Personal Details\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Existing Loan Info\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOutput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n     \u003cp\u003e\r\n      The app provides:\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Predicted customer risk status (Low / High)\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Credit score calculation\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Visual breakdowns of loan purpose and savings behavior by risk group\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Interactive risk distribution charts\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eBenefits\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Reduce Default Risk: Quickly identify high-risk applicants before approving loans.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Process Applications Faster: Cut decision time with automated risk scoring.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Match Products to Customers: Identify which financial products suit different risk profiles.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Spot Risk Patterns: See clear visualizations of how savings levels and loan purposes relate to default rates.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "placeholder": "",
      "prefix": "",

appStages.name: Update Scoring Parameters
Data Profiling
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eData Validation\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eUpload file and click Run Data Profiling to get results.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "customClass": "border rounded p-1",

      "type": "fieldset",
      "label": "Field Set",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "components": [
        {
          "label": "Upload customer credit file",
          "description": "Data should have the following columns:Age, Sex, Job,\tHousing, Saving accounts,\tChecking account,\tCredit amount\tDuration,\tPurpose,\tRisk.",

          "tableView": false,
          "storage": "base64",
          "webcam": false,
          "fileTypes": [
            {
              "label": "",
              "value": ""

          ],

        },
        {

appStages.name: Compute Credit Score
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eCompute Credit Score\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eEnter Applicant ID and click on Compute Credit score to get results.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Applicant ID",
              "placeholder": "1,2,3",
              "description": "Multiple ids can be separated by comma without any space.",
              "tooltip": "Please enter an Applicant ID for whom Credit Score is to be computed. Multiple values can be entered separated by comma without any space in between.",
              "customClass": "padding-top:10px; m-4",
              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true,
                "pattern": "^[0-9]+(\\,[0-9]+)*$"
              },
              "key": "applicantID",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "defaultValue": "1,2,3"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {

appStages.name: Prediction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003ePrediction\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eclick the \u0027Run Prediction\u0027 option to initiate the prediction process for the uploaded file.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,

          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Run Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "submit2",
